content: hello my hubby just reenlisted for Fort Lewis. the reenlister told him he definitely got 555th Eng Brigade, but he couldn't tell him what unit we would be in. now we got a letter from 555th eng brigade, saying " welcome to 22nd company". but it doesnt say what unit it is. i looked online and didnt find any engineers unit that had a 22nd company. does anybody have a clue?
reply: hello my hubby just reenlisted for Fort Lewis. the reenlister told him he definitely got 555th Eng Brigade, but he couldn't tell him what unit we would be in. now we got a letter from 555th eng brigade, saying " welcome to 22nd company". but it doesnt say what unit it is. i looked online and didnt find any engineers unit that had a 22nd company. does anybody have a clue?

content: Thanks for pointing her in the right direction. BTW, 940, the 555th Engineers are the “Triple Nickel” A listening ear, a caring heart, an open mind and an extend hand may be all I can offer, but they are yours without charge or judgment.

content: Don't know if you have your answer yet or not, but maybe this site will help you. <<<<http://www.lewis.army.mil/555/>>>> EDIT: There are only two Subordinate Engineer Units at Fort Lewis, the 864th and the 14th. If they didn't specify a "sub-unit", is it possibly just the 22nd Company in the 555th? The letter should have given him points of contact. Start there. This message has been edited. Last edited by: armywifefigueroa, Tue 03 March 2009 08:35 AM
